text:
This covers the broad strokes: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/how-to-manage-multi-language-content-with-HubSpots-cos>
As far as the best way to manage multi-language on the design-manager side of things, no official documentation there. Depends a lot on how the site is set up, imo.
If there's a multi-lingual blog as well, I've outlined something of a workaround that you can try - <https://blog.HubSpot.com/customers/removing-language-barrier-multi-language-module-HubSpot-blogs>
